statement.p: For the right triangle below, find the length of a.

A triangle. Going around counterclockwise, an angle is unlabeled. An angle is labeled 39 degrees and its opposite side is labeled a. An angle has a right angle symbol and its opposite side is labeled 15 yd.

p.em: Enter the value for \displaystyle{a} (accurate to at least two decimal places) and include the units of measure.
